message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

This paper is about image and video captioning, which involves computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses the use of language models and training algorithms, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper proposes upper bounds on performance metrics, which could fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, since the paper deals with video captioning, it could also be relevant to cs.MM (Multimedia).
